name: Naruto Fan Game: Kyoubou Sentou
description: Kyoubou Sentou is a hack and slash free stand alone fighter akin to Naruto Naiteki Kensei you can currently use both Naruto and Sasuke in the preliminary arena to practice jutsu and melee combat.However character creation and other maps will be added soon for more information visit http://www.indiedb.com/games/naruto-kyoubou-sentou
